explanation: BTC sentiment is highly mixed with vocal short and long camps, but the most recent and frequent comments show significant bullish bias: several users report taking long positions or holding longs, there is spot buying fueling the current rally, and an unusually large buy (over $111M on Binance) was spotted, suggesting major players are accumulating. While some warn of potential traps and volatility, many expect further upward moves, with suggestions of liquidity grabs before another leg up. Caution is warranted, but the overall flow, large spot buys, and ongoing bullish technical setups (inverse H&S, cup and handle, trendline holds) support a high-confidence buy signal. Safe leverage is set at 20x due to persistent volatility and the risk of sharp retracements.
